parameters.formDescription: Search for suspicious transactions in your banking database

parameters.content:
## ğŸ¯ ENTRY POINT
User fills out fraud detection form with:
- Minimum transaction amount
- Time range (1hr to 3 days)
- Optional customer ID filter
- Output format (Text/CSV)

ğŸ’¡ TIP: Form auto-validates required fields!

## ğŸ”§ QUERY BUILDER
Transforms user input into Elasticsearch query:

âœ… Converts time ranges:
   "Last 24 Hours" â†’ "now-24h"
   "Last 3 Days" â†’ "now-3d"

âœ… Builds filters:
   â€¢ Amount >= minimum
   â€¢ Timestamp within range

ğŸ“Š Output: Ready-to-use ES query + metadata

## ğŸ¯ DATA HUNTER
Searches bank_transactions index for suspicious activity

ğŸ”§ Configuration:
   â€¢ POST to localhost:9220
   â€¢ Uses HTTP Basic Auth
   â€¢ Sends JSON query from previous node

âš ï¸ Note: Requires valid ES credentials!

## ğŸ“ REPORT GENERATOR
Transforms raw ES data into user-friendly reports

ğŸ¨ Creates two formats:
   ğŸ“„ TEXT: Human-readable fraud summary

ğŸ”„ Output: Content + Binary data ready for file save

## ğŸ“ FILE SAVER
Writes the fraud report to server disk

ğŸ“ Location: /tmp/fraud_report_YYYY-MM-DD.{txt|csv}
ğŸ”§ Uses binary data from Format Report node
âœ… File ready for download or further processing

ğŸ¯ Perfect for:
   â€¢ Audit trails

   â€¢ Compliance reporting

## ğŸ¯ FRAUD DETECTION PIPELINE

User Form â†’ Query Builder â†’ ES Search â†’ Report Format â†’ File Save

â±ï¸ Typical execution: 2-5 seconds
